Luaf

Lua for learning and laufs

View the Project on GitHub tanema/luaf

List of features that are unsupported

This is a place that I will try to keep track of a list of functionalities that I have intentionally decided to not support.

  • Byte Order Marks
  • library flag -l
  • - flag, just use a pipe?
  • debug library
    • I find the lua debug library quite bad so I am trying to provide more binding.pry type behaviour here and not have to understand the interpreter to find local values
